solution_line_template: Uki earns {cupcakes_per_day} x ${cupcake_price} = $<<{cupcakes_per_day}*{cupcake_price}={cupcake_earnings}>>{cupcake_earnings} in selling {cupcakes_per_day} cupcakes.
She earns {cookies_per_day} x ${cookie_price} = $<<{cookies_per_day}*{cookie_price}={cookie_earnings}>>{cookie_earnings} for selling {cookies_per_day} packets of cookies,
Additionally, she earns another {biscuits_per_day} x ${biscuit_price} = $<<{biscuits_per_day}*{biscuit_price}={biscuit_earnings}>>{biscuit_earnings} for selling twenty packets of biscuits.

Thus, in a day, she earns an average of ${cupcake_earnings} + ${cookie_earnings} + ${biscuit_earnings} = ${daily_earnings}.                                                                       Therefore, for five days, Uki earns {days} x ${daily_earnings} = $<<{days}*{daily_earnings}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.  "
